relproducts.title: Premium Shimmer Black Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
relproducts.description: Looking for something to perfectly compliment that tonal bathroom scheme you've had in mind? Well we think this premium shimmer black venetian blind would be just perfect. The dramatically dark finish is infused with glittering sparkles, making each slat look like a narrow looking for something to perfectly compliment that tonal bathroom scheme you've had in mind? Well we think this premium shimmer black venetian blind would be just perfect.

relproducts.title: Premium Blue Shimmer Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
relproducts.description: The electric shade of the premium blue shimmer is stunning enough, but peer closely at the aluminium slats and you'll see the brushed, metallic finish that positively sparkles. Unexpected shadows and highlights spring to life across the slats thanks to that finish, making fo the electric shade of the premium blue shimmer is stunning enough, but peer closely at the aluminium slats and you'll see the brushed, metallic finish that positively sparkles.

relproducts.title: Marble Shimmer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The intricate texture of marble shimmer invites your eye in to take a closer look at a fabric that is certainly more than it first appears. As you survey the changes in direction of the pattern you quickly lose yourself in the moment and feel at ease. If you want to project the theme around the room then you need to think about other natural patterns you can work in. The undulating texture of slate, the rings on a log slice, and the way in which the light dances with sprung copper would all be interesting things to look at.

relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.
